about_the_game:
Fight It Out In Aria Skies

Create a tag team of your favorite characters and battle your friends locally or using Steam Remote Play in this non-traditional 2.5D fighter where positioning is key! An easy to grasp control scheme allows anyone to come and join the battle!

Try The Demo Before The Full Release!

Aria Skies will release with more Characters, Stages, Balancing and Polish! Try this demo to get a taste of the game.
Share feedback with the developer before the full release through the survey or Community Discord!
